- You will learn five random roles, at least two of which will be Town roles, at least one of which will be a role that opposes the Town, and one of which will be your targetâ€™s role. Your results are not mutually exclusive and may only contain roles that could spawn in the current game.
- If you investigate the same player again, you will learn the same result.
- If your target is not a member of the Town, they will learn that they were investigated and the result you were given.
